response:
In the Content License Agreement between PSiTech Corporation and Empirical Ventures, Inc., the audit rights are outlined in the following clause:

Under the Content License Agreement, the AS Parties (which includes PSiTech Corporation and Empirical Ventures, Inc.) have the right to conduct audits of MusclePharm, as follows:

1. The AS Parties shall have the right, upon providing at least five (5) days' written notice, to inspect MusclePharm's books and records, as well as any other materials related to the Licensed Products.
2. Licensor (PSiTech Corporation) may take copies and abstracts of the materials audited.
3. In case an audit reveals an underpayment of five percent (5%) or more, Licensee (Empirical Ventures, Inc.) shall reimburse Licensor for the reasonable cost of the audit.

In summary, the audit rights under this agreement involve the inspection of MusclePharm's records and materials, the right to take copies and abstracts of audited materials, and reimbursement for the reasonable costs of the audit if an underpayment of 5% or more is discovered.
